examples: She deposited her money in the bank.
He works at a local bank.
The river flows beside the bank.
Ela depositou seu dinheiro no banco.
Ele trabalha em um banco local.
O rio flui ao lado do banco.

suggested: Why did the piggy bank go to therapy? It was dealing with some serious 'coin'fidence issues!
Feeling a sense of sadness when you see long lines and crowded spaces in a busy 'bank'.
I get so angry when banks impose excessive fees and hidden charges on their customers.
Did you know that the first 'bank' established dates back to ancient Mesopotamia around 2,000 BCE?
There's no specific smell associated with a 'bank', but it might remind you of the scent of money or the fragrance of security.
The feel of smooth marble countertops or the texture of banknotes in your hands when you visit a 'bank'.
'Banks' play a crucial role in our economic system, connecting individuals and businesses by providing financial services.
